Package be.anticair.anticairapi.keycloak.service

Class ListingService

java.lang.Object
be.anticair.anticairapi.keycloak.service.ListingService
@Service public class ListingService extends Object
Service for performing listing-related operations.
Author:
Blommaert Youry, Neve Thierry

      Create a new listing in the database.
      Parameters:
      email - The email of the user creating the listing.
      newListing - The listing to create.
      photos - The photos to associate with the listing.
      Returns:
      The created listing.
      Throws:
      jakarta.mail.MessagingException

    • updateListing

      public Listing updateListing(Long id, Listing updatedListing) throws jakarta.mail.MessagingException, IOException
      Updates the details of an existing listing based on the provided ID.

      This method searches for a listing by its ID and updates its properties (such as price, description, title, etc.) with the values provided in the Listing object. If no listing is found with the given ID, a RuntimeException is thrown.

      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the listing to be updated
      updatedListing - the Listing object containing the new values to update the listing
      Returns:
      the updated Listing object after saving it to the database
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if no listing is found with the given ID
      jakarta.mail.MessagingException
      IOException

    • getListingById

      public ListingWithPhotosDto getListingById(Integer id)
      Retrieves a listing by its ID along with its associated photos.

      This method searches for a listing by its ID and retrieves all the photos associated with that listing. If no listing is found with the given ID, a RuntimeException is thrown. The method returns a ListingWithPhotosDto object containing the listing details and the associated photos.

      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the listing to retrieve
      Returns:
      a ListingWithPhotosDto object containing the listing and its associated photos
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if no listing is found with the given ID
      See Also:
      • PhotoAntiquityService.findByIdAntiquity(Integer)
      • ListingWithPhotosDto

      Function to apply the commission
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the antiquity
      Returns:
      the antiquity with the commission

    • changeListingAntiquarian

      public boolean changeListingAntiquarian(Listing antiquity, String emailNewAntiquarian) throws jakarta.mail.MessagingException, IOException
      Allow to change the antiquarian of the antiquity
      Parameters:
      antiquity - the antiquity that we want to change the antiquarian
      emailNewAntiquarian - the email of the new antiquarian
      Returns:
      a boolean, true if the change has been made, false, in case of a problem
      Throws:
      jakarta.mail.MessagingException
      IOException

    • getAntiquitiesByState

      public List<Listing> getAntiquitiesByState(String mailAntiquarian)
      Retrieves all antiquities associated with a specific antiquarian that have a state of 0 or 2.

      This method queries the database to find all antiquities that match the provided antiquarian's email and whose state is either 0 or 2. The resulting list contains only the antiquities that satisfy these criteria.

      Parameters:
      mailAntiquarian - the email of the antiquarian whose antiquities are to be retrieved
      Returns:
      a list of Listing objects that match the filtering criteria
      See Also:
      • ListingRepository.findByStateInAndMailAntiquarian(List, String)

    • getAntiquitiesByMailSeller

      public List<Listing> getAntiquitiesByMailSeller(String mailSeller)
      Retrieves a list of visible antiquities (isDisplay = true) associated with a seller by their email. This method filters the antiquities retrieved by checking their `isDisplay` field and returns only those that are marked as visible (isDisplay = true).
      Parameters:
      mailSeller - The email address of the seller for whom the antiquities are retrieved.
      Returns:
      A list of `Listing` containing the visible antiquities associated with the seller's email.

    • updateIsDisplay

      public Listing updateIsDisplay(long id)
      Updates the 'isDisplay' field of a listing to false based on the provided ID. This method finds the listing by its ID, and if the listing exists, it sets the `isDisplay` field to `false` and saves the updated listing.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the listing to update.
      Returns:
      The updated `Listing` object with `isDisplay` set to `false`.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - If the listing with the provided ID is not found.
